results.title: Metformin to treat Huntington disease: A pleiotropic drug against a multi-system disorder.
results.text_hl: These molecules regulate autophagy, chaperone expression, and more, which in turn reduce @<m>DISEASE_Albinism_Oculocutaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016115 @@@mHtt toxicity@@@. Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alters gut microbiome and its metabolic processes.
